meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this 30in. vanity set featuring a 0.71in. thick vanity top, 3 faucet holes, and soft-close hinges. Includes sink and cabinet hardware. Contemporary design with finished back and engineered stone top. No assembly required. 1 year warranty. Commercial use approved. Made in Malaysia."
meta_title: "Irene 30" Free Standing Vanity Set | Cabinet, Marble Top & Backsplash"
